t2: There are many good reasons to decide in favour of Green Wind Offshore´s technical management. Every member of our team is a good reason. And all together, we are more than the sum of individuals. Our motto: Full power ahead!

team.name: Manuel Lasse
team.bio: has been in the wind power business since 2006.

team.name: Andreas Texheimer
team.bio: with accuracy and a focus on safety first.

team.name: Fabio da Fonseca Bola
team.bio: using the latest wind energy knowledge straight from university.

team.name: Andrei Petrescu
team.bio: with passion specialised in wind energy

team.name: Enrico Berger
team.bio: keeping on top of electrical parameters

team.name: Jens Neumann
team.bio: 100 percent for a future-oriented energy production.

team.name: Steven Melendez
team.bio: with wind energy into a pollutant-free future - for the well-being of man and nature.

team.name: Emanuel Fätke
team.job: Head of Technical Project Management Dolwin3 & Sales

team.name: Anne Pfannes
team.bio: with a meticulous sense for figures and new ideas.

team.name: Katharina Haupt
team.bio: focuses on finances for windy alternatives.

team.name: Martin Kühl
team.bio: involved in the wind power business since 1995 and is fascinated by the power of the wind.

team.name: Göran Meyer (external)
team.bio: with the motto: The oceans are more to us.
